text: Roger Hassenforder (23 July 1930 - 3 January 2021) was a French professional racing cyclist. He was born in Sausheim, France. His career lasted from 1952 to 1965. He participated in the Tour de France in 1953, 1954, 1955, 1956, 1957 and 1959. Hassenforder died on 3 January 2021 at the age of 90.Décès du cycliste Roger Hassenforder, ancienne vedette du Tour de France ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:People from Haut-Rhin Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Grand Est
title: Roger Hassenforder
